headline: The Bull Case For Revvity (RVTY) Could Change Following Upbeat 2025 Guidance And New Lilly AI Alliance
summary: In recent days, Revvity, Inc. updated its outlook for the fourth quarter and full year 2025, guiding to approximately US$772,000,000 in Q4 revenue and about US$2.86 billion for the year, while indicating adjusted earnings per share should exceed its prior guidance range. A separate announcement revealed that Revvity and Eli Lilly are jointly expanding access to Lilly’s TuneLab AI models through Revvity’s Signals platform, underscoring Revvity’s push to embed advanced AI and federated...
